ISSUE.TITLE: Match URL path and breadcrumbs on a product page when "Product URL structure type" is Category
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.60 Steps to reproduce the problem: Step 1: Redirect on Admin panel > Configuration > Settings > Catalog setting > Product page tab > Product URL structure type as (/category/product) Step 2: Create 1 product from admin side Step 3: Add multiple category from this product from admin side. Step 4: Save product and redirect on public side Step 5: Open Configured product from any category Step 6: Observe that Slug and Breadcrumb is not showing proper Expected result: Slug and Breadcrumb should show proper Please refer attachment ![Slug_breadcrumb ](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/82799708/208871616-33235f3f-bdf9-4500-8485-d2de8035a472.png)
